but what the fuck the submenu should not appear at first whats this shitty ui shit do better ui/ux
please gemini at least try the display should be flex row for the ul and no need for capsules for the li's and the colors should make sence so the items anchors could be visible

i dont like the submenu there is weird red i want an overall compatible ui
